articles.title: 'No justice, no peace': Tens of thousands in London protest death of Floyd - Reuters
articles.description: Tens of thousands of people chanting "no justice, no peace, no racist police" marched through central London on Wednesday to protest against racism after the death of George Floyd in Minneapolis.
